attributes.comment:
To whom it may concern,

I am writing in regards to the increase of 66% pertaining to docket#USCIS-2006-
0044. I am in complete opposition to an increase which makes an already
difficult,costly and timely process a deterent for many considering adoption.This
could potentially eliminate many prospective adoptive parents from considering the
tedious process.Every child deserves a chance of a loving family.I would hate to
think that this would have a negative impact on orphans that need a loving
family.Please vote NO to this change as it could be a permanent change for the
worse.

Thank You,
Linda DeLuca

Comment on FR Doc # E7-01631
attributes.title: Comment Submitted By Linda DeLuca
